input.sentences: the twins were celebrating their second birthday .
one of the presents they got was a doll .
they blew out the candles in their cupcakes .
they posed for a picture with their new dolls and the other kids in the family .
more people squeezed onto the couch for a birthday picture with the girls .
output.sentences: Two little girls opened a box together.
One little girl played with her doll.
The twins celebrated with a cupcake each.
The kids all got onto the couch for a photo.
The grandparents wanted a photo with all of their grandchildren.
